title: Comment from You ask my name but say I shouldn't identify myse

analysis.key_quote: Civil servants should NOT be political appointees, they should be people qualified in their field and hired by their expertise, not appointed to push the presidential agenda.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of hiring based on expertise rather than political affiliation, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the integrity of the merit-based system.
